titleStmt.title: Report HS 4440 A new high-pressure low-temperature modification of calcium The new diffraction data collected at ID09a of the ESRF confirm the observation of the new high-pressure form of Ca. In some patterns, the new modification is obtained as a singlephase material. For reasons of priority in this currently very active field [1], we will not give more details here, but refer to a publication currently being written for Physical Review
